name: SpaceCoaster VR
description: Enjoy a virtual reality rollercoaster through space with twists, turns and plenty of spaceships.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 658 MB available space
